languages.text: {n}Ответ Паскаля сметает слова Нихель, словно порыв шторма. Оптический визор наливается ослепительной синевой.{/n} "Нет, техносестра. Отказ от сопротивления никогда не был нашим путем. Я — Эксплоратор, разведчик Познания. Я принес огонь на сотню миров, я прозрел во тьме тысячу секретов. Я — агент неукротимого стремления! Я не отдамся забвению, потому что само забвение страшится меня".

{n}Pasqal's reply sweeps Nihel's words away like a gust of wind. His optical visor turns a blinding blue.{/n} "No, tech-sister. Refraining from resistance was never our way. I am an Explorator, a reconnoitrer of Knowledge. I have brought fire to a hundred worlds. I have gleaned a thousand secrets in the darkness. I am an agent of unbridled will! I will not yield to oblivion, for oblivion itself fears me."
languages.original_text: {n}Ответ Паскаля сметает слова Нихель, словно порыв шторма. Оптический визор наливается ослепительной синевой.{/n} "Нет, техносестра. Отказ от сопротивления никогда не был нашим путем. Я — Эксплоратор, разведчик Познания. Я принес огонь на сотню миров, я прозрел во тьме тысячу секретов. Я — агент неукротимого стремления! Я не отдамся забвению, потому что само забвение страшится меня".

I am an Explorator, a reconnoitrer of Knowledge. I have brought fire to a hundred worlds. I have gleaned a thousand secrets in the darkness. I am an agent of unbridled will! languages.text: {n}パスカルの返答がニヘルの言葉を一陣の風のごとく一掃する。彼の光学バイザーが青色に変わる。{/n}「技術同胞よ、断る。抵抗をやめることは、断じて自分たちの道ではなかった。自分は探究者、知識の踏査者だ。百の星々に火をもたらしてきた。千の秘密を闇の中から拾い集めてきた。自分は自由意志の代弁者だ！忘却に屈するつもりはない、忘却こそ自分を恐れているのだから」
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's reply sweeps Nihel's words away like a gust of wind. His optical visor turns a blinding blue.{/n} "No, tech-sister. Refraining from resistance was never our way. I am an Explorator, a reconnoitrer of Knowledge. I have brought fire to a hundred worlds. I have gleaned a thousand secrets in the darkness. I am an agent of unbridled will! I will not yield to oblivion, for oblivion itself fears me."

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルの返答がニヘルの言葉を一陣の風のごとく一掃する。彼の光学バイザーが青色に変わる。{/n}「技術同胞よ、断る。抵抗をやめることは、断じて自分たちの道ではなかった。自分は探究者、知識の踏査者だ。百の星々に火をもたらしてきた。千の秘密を闇の中から拾い集めてきた。自分は自由意志の代弁者だ！忘却に屈するつもりはない、忘却こそ自分を恐れているのだから」

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡的回答像狂风一样，扫走了妮赫尔的话。他的光学面甲发出了刺眼的蓝光。{/n}“不，技术姐妹，坐以待毙从来都不是我们的行事方式。我是开拓者，知识的勘探者，我曾把火种播散至数百个世界，在黑暗中收集了数千个秘密。我就是无拘意志的代理人！我绝不会屈服于湮灭，而湮灭本身也将在我面前退怯。”
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's reply sweeps Nihel's words away like a gust of wind. His optical visor turns a blinding blue.{/n} "No, tech-sister. Refraining from resistance was never our way. I am an Explorator, a reconnoitrer of Knowledge. I have brought fire to a hundred worlds. I have gleaned a thousand secrets in the darkness. I am an agent of unbridled will! I will not yield to oblivion, for oblivion itself fears me."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡的回答像狂风一样，扫走了雅珀的话。他的光学面甲发出了刺眼的蓝光。{/n}“不，技术姐妹，坐以待毙从来都不是我们的行事方式。我是开拓者，知识的勘探者，我曾把火种播散至数百个世界，在黑暗中收集了数千个秘密。我就是无拘意志的代理人！我绝不会屈服于湮灭，而湮灭本身也将在我面前退怯。”

languages.text: {n}Telle une tempête, la réponse de Pasqal vient balayer les paroles de Nihel alors que son viseur optique diffuse une lumière bleue aveuglante.{/n} « Non, technoconsœur. Ne pas résister n'est pas dans notre nature. Je suis un explorator, un chercheur de connaissance. J'ai immolé des centaines de mondes. J'ai arraché des milliers de secrets aux ténèbres. Je suis un agent de la volonté inflexible ! Je ne me soumettrai pas au néant, car le néant lui-même me craint. »
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's reply sweeps Nihel's words away like a gust of wind. His optical visor turns a blinding blue.{/n} "No, tech-sister. Refraining from resistance was never our way. I am an Explorator, a reconnoitrer of Knowledge. I have brought fire to a hundred worlds. I have gleaned a thousand secrets in the darkness. I am an agent of unbridled will! I will not yield to oblivion, for oblivion itself fears me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Telle une tempête, la réponse de Pasqal vient balayer les paroles de Nihel alors que son viseur optique diffuse une lumière bleue aveuglante.{/n} « Non, technoconsœur. Ne pas résister n'est pas dans notre nature. Je suis un explorator, un chercheur de connaissance. J'ai immolé des centaines de mondes. J'ai arraché des milliers de secrets aux ténèbres. Je suis un agent de la volonté inflexible ! Je ne me soumettrai pas au néant, car le néant lui-même me craint. »

languages.text: {n}La respuesta de Pasqal se lleva las palabras de Nihel por delante como una ráfaga de viento. Su visor óptico brilla con un deslumbrante tono azul.{/n} «No, tecnohermana. Nunca hemos optado por evitar la resistencia. Soy un Explorador, un reconocedor del Conocimiento. He iluminado cien mundos. He averiguado miles de secretos en la oscuridad. ¡Soy el reflejo de una voluntad incontrolable! ¡No caeré en el olvido, pues el propio olvido me teme!».
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's reply sweeps Nihel's words away like a gust of wind. His optical visor turns a blinding blue.{/n} "No, tech-sister. Refraining from resistance was never our way. I am an Explorator, a reconnoitrer of Knowledge. I have brought fire to a hundred worlds. I have gleaned a thousand secrets in the darkness. I am an agent of unbridled will! I will not yield to oblivion, for oblivion itself fears me."

traits.locale_text: {n}La respuesta de Pasqal se lleva las palabras de Nihel por delante como una ráfaga de viento. Su visor óptico brilla con un deslumbrante tono azul.{/n} «No, tecnohermana. Nunca hemos optado por evitar la resistencia. Soy un Explorador, un reconocedor del Conocimiento. He iluminado cien mundos. He averiguado miles de secretos en la oscuridad. ¡Soy el reflejo de una voluntad incontrolable! ¡No caeré en el olvido, pues el propio olvido me teme!».

languages.text: {n}Pasqals Antwort fegt Nihels Worte fort wie ein Windböe. Sein optischer Visor färbt sich blendend blau.{/n} "Nein, Tech-Schwester. Es war nie unsere Art, Widerstand zu scheuen. Ich ein Explorator, ein Erkunder des Wissens. Ich habe das Feuer in einhundert Welten gebracht. Ich habe in der Dunkelheit eintausend Geheimnisse erfahren. Ich bin ein Agent von ungezügeltem Willen! Ich werde mich nicht dem Vergessen unterwerfen, denn das Vergessen selbst fürchtet mich."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's reply sweeps Nihel's words away like a gust of wind. His optical visor turns a blinding blue.{/n} "No, tech-sister. Refraining from resistance was never our way. I am an Explorator, a reconnoitrer of Knowledge. I have brought fire to a hundred worlds. I have gleaned a thousand secrets in the darkness. I am an agent of unbridled will! I will not yield to oblivion, for oblivion itself fears me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqals Antwort fegt Nihels Worte fort wie ein Windböe. Sein optischer Visor färbt sich blendend blau.{/n} "Nein, Tech-Schwester. Es war nie unsere Art, Widerstand zu scheuen. Ich ein Explorator, ein Erkunder des Wissens. Ich habe das Feuer in einhundert Welten gebracht. Ich habe in der Dunkelheit eintausend Geheimnisse erfahren. Ich bin ein Agent von ungezügeltem Willen! Ich werde mich nicht dem Vergessen unterwerfen, denn das Vergessen selbst fürchtet mich."

languages.text: {n}Pasqal'ın yanıtı, Nihel'in sözlerini rüzgâr gibi süpürüyor. Optik vizörü; kör edici, mavi bir ışık saçmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Hayır tekno kardeşim. Direnmekten kaçınmak, hiçbir zaman tercihimiz olmamıştır. Ben bir Keşiftör'üm. İrfan araştırmacısıyım. Yüzlerce dünyaya ateş götürdüm. Karanlıktan binlerce sır çıkardım. Dizginsiz bir iradenin temsilcisiyim! Yok oluşa boyun eğmem. Bilakis o benden korkar."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's reply sweeps Nihel's words away like a gust of wind. His optical visor turns a blinding blue.{/n} "No, tech-sister. Refraining from resistance was never our way. I am an Explorator, a reconnoitrer of Knowledge. I have brought fire to a hundred worlds. I have gleaned a thousand secrets in the darkness. I am an agent of unbridled will! I will not yield to oblivion, for oblivion itself fears me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal'ın yanıtı, Nihel'in sözlerini rüzgâr gibi süpürüyor. Optik vizörü kör edici, mavi bir ışık saçmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Hayır tekno kardeşim. Direnmekten kaçınmak hiçbir zaman tercihimiz olmamıştır. Ben bir Keşiftör'üm. İrfan araştırmacısıyım. Yüzlerce dünyaya ateş götürmüşümdür. Karanlığın içinden binlerce sır çıkarmışımdır. Ben dizginsiz bir iradenin temsilcisiyim! Yok oluşa boyun eğmem. Bilakis yok oluş benden korkar."
